articles.title: Solar storm ALERT! M3-class solar flare sparks blackouts over Indian Ocean - HT Tech
articles.description: A M3-class solar flare erupted on the Sun and it caused radio blackouts over the Indian Ocean region. Astronomers fear that it can also lead to another solar storm in the coming days.

articles.title: Researchers make an important step towards the quantum internet using diamond nanostructures - Phys.org
articles.description: Diamond material is of great importance for future technologies such as the quantum internet. Special defect centers can be used as quantum bits (qubits) and emit single light particles that are referred to as single photons.
